detail.content: YZF-R6 with next generation R-series design
Aggressive face with dual LED position lights
Quick Shift System for clutchless upshifts
Dual 320mm front discs with radial calipers
Totally new concept in the motorcycle industry
Radical, bold and unique design
Deep lean angle, maximum 45 degrees
847 cc, 3-cylinder, liquid-cooled, DOHC CP3 engine
TCS, QSS, A&S clutch, D-MODE, Cruise Control
Exclusive blue/silver colour scheme
Torque-rich 4-cylinder 'CP4' crossplane engine
YCC-T, D-MODE and Traction Control System (TCS)
Ultra-short wheelbase aluminium Deltabox chassis
High specification brakes with radial front calipers
Dynamic mass-forward silhouette
58-cubic-inch (942cc) air-cooled SOHC V-twin; 4 valves
The Bolt® R-Spec is stripped down with minimal chrome
Sporty leaning-forward riding position
Café racer cowling and clip-on handlebars
High-torque air-cooled 60-degree V-twin engine
Piggyback-style gas rear shocks
Side cases, high screen, skid plate, fog lamps
1199 cc, liquid-cooled, inline, 2-cylinder engine
Traction control, cruise control and Yamaha D-MODE
Tough spoked aluminium wheels with tubeless tyres
Adjustable seat height from 845 mm-870 mm
